Specifiy product numbers that can be added for free to the shopping cart. Multiple free products must be separated with a semicolon(;). A list of product numbers to select from must be separated by commas. For example; "1,2,3;4" will give product number 1 or 2 or 3; and product number 4, if added to the shoppping cart
